data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: NW Mooring, LOCO Experiment 2006, Monterey Bay, California, USA (LOCONW)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at NW Mooring, LOCO Experiment 2006, Monterey Bay, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using a StowAway Tidbit Temperature Logger (Onset Computer Corp. TBIC32+4+27) beginning 2006-07-10. The instrument depth was 015 meters, in an overall water depth of 19 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 1.0 minutes.
